017
018package org.tquadrat.bloodpressure;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigUtil.getConfiguration;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.SpecialPropertyType.CONFIG_PROPERTY_CLOCK;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.TextUse.USAGE;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.PROPERTY_USER_NAME;
025
026import java.io.File;
027import java.nio.charset.Charset;
028import java.nio.file.Path;
029import java.sql.Connection;
030import java.sql.SQLException;
031import java.time.Clock;
032import java.time.LocalDate;
033import java.time.ZoneId;
034import java.util.Map;
035import java.util.Optional;
036
037import org.apiguardian.api.API;
038import org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.internal.ConfigurationBase;
039import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBeanSpec;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigBeanSpec;
042import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigurationBeanSpecification;
043import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ExemptFromToString;
044import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.I18nSupport;
045import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.INIBeanSpec;
046import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.INIFileConfig;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.INIValue;
048import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option;
049import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.SpecialProperty;
050import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.SystemProperty;
051import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.BaseBundleName;
052import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.MessagePrefix;
053import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Text;
054import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Translation;
055
056/**
057 *  The configuration bean specification for the Blood Pressure Statistics
058 *  application.
059 *
060 *  @version $Id: Configuration.java 151 2022-03-15 20:39:31Z tquadrat $
061 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
062 *  @UMLGraph.link
063 *  @since 0.0.1
064 */
065@SuppressWarnings( "ClassWithTooManyMethods" )
066@ConfigurationBeanSpecification( baseClass = ConfigurationBase.class, synchronizeAccess = false )
067@INIFileConfig( comment = "Settings for the Blood Pressure Statistics application", mustExist = false, path = "${dataFolder}bloodpressure.ini" )
068@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: Configuration.java 151 2022-03-15 20:39:31Z tquadrat $" )
069@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
070public interface Configuration extends CLIBeanSpec, ConfigBeanSpec, I18nSupport, INIBeanSpec
071{
072        /*-----------*\
073    ====** Constants **========================================================
074        \*-----------*/
075    /**
076     *  The name of the resource bundle for the texts and messages: {@value}.
077     */
078    @SuppressWarnings( "unused" )
079    @BaseBundleName( defaultLanguage = "de" )
080    public static final String BASE_BUNDLE_NAME = "org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.TextsAndMessages";
081
082    /**
083     *  The name for the key column of the blood pressure data table: {@value}.
084     *
085     *  @see #TABLE_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA
086     */
087    public static final String COLUMN_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA_PRIMARY_KEY = "MEASURING_DATETIME";
088
089    /**
090     *  The message prefix for messages from this application: {@value}.
091     */
092    @SuppressWarnings( "unused" )
093    @MessagePrefix
094    public static final String MESSAGE_PREFIX = "BPS";
095
096    /**
097     *  The table name for the blood pressure data: {@value}. The schema is the
098     *  default schema.
099     */
100    public static final String TABLE_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA = "BLOODPRESSURE_DATA";
101
102        /*---------*\
103    ====** Methods **==========================================================
104        \*---------*/
105    /**
106     *  Returns the birthdate of the person whose blood pressure data is
107     *  processed.
108     *
109     *  @return The birthdate.
110     */
111    @Text(
112        description = "The usage text for the --birthdate option",
113        use = USAGE,
114        id = "Birthdate",
115        translations =
116            {
117                @Translation( language = "de", text = "Das Geburtsdatum der Person, deren Blutdruckdaten verarbeitet werden" ),
118                @Translation( language = "en", text = "The birthdate of the person whose blood pressure data is processed" )
119            }
120    )
121    @Option( name = "--birthdate", aliases = { "--birthday"}, metaVar = "DATA", usageKey = "org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.USAGE_Birthdate" )
122    @INIValue( group = "Owner", key = "birthdate", comment = "The birthdate of the person whose blood pressure data is processed" )
123    public LocalDate getBirthdate();
124
125    /**
126     *  <p>{@summary Returns the clock that is used by this program.}</p>
127     *  <p>It can be adjusted for testing purposes.</p>
128     *
129     *  @return The clock.
130     */
131    @SpecialProperty( CONFIG_PROPERTY_CLOCK )
132    public Clock getClock();
133
134    /**
135     *  Returns the name of the database.
136     *
137     *  @return The name of the database that is used by this application.
138     */
139    public String getDatabaseName();
140
141    /**
142     *  Returns the password for the access to the database.
143     *
144     *  @return The database password.
145     */
146    @ExemptFromToString
147    public String getDatabasePassword();
148
149    /**
150     *  Returns the folder that holds the data for the program.
151     *
152     *  @return The data folder.
153     */
154    public Path getDataFolder();
155
156    /**
157     *  Returns the destination file for a dump from the database. An existing
158     *  file will be overwritten.
159     *
160     *  @return An instance of
161     *      {@link Optional}
162     *      that holds the dump file.
163     */
164    @Text(
165        description = "The usage text for the --dump option",
166        use = USAGE,
167        id = "Dump",
168        translations =
169        {
170            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Ausgabedatei für einen Datenbank-Auszug; eine bereits bestehende Datei wird überschrieben" ),
171            @Translation( language = "en", text = "Output file for a database dump; an already existing file will be overwritten" )
172        }
173    )
174    @Option( name = "--dump", metaVar = "FILE", usageKey = "org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.USAGE_Dump" )
175    public Optional<File> getDumpFile();
176
177    /**
178     *  Returns the end date for a report.
179     *
180     *  @return The end date.
181     */
182    @Text(
183        description = "The usage text for the --reportEnd option",
184        use = USAGE,
185        id = "ReportEnd",
186        translations =
187            {
188                @Translation( language = "de", text = "Das Ende-Datum für die Report-Periode" ),
189                @Translation( language = "en", text = "The end date for the report period" )
190            }
191    )
192    @Option( name = "--reportEnd", metaVar = "DATE", usageKey = "org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.USAGE_ReportEnd" )
193    public LocalDate getEndDate();
194
195    /**
196     *  Returns the file to import.
197     *
198     *  @return An instance of
199     *      {@link Optional}
200     *      that holds the file to import.
201     */
202    @Text(
203        description = "The usage text for the --import option",
204        use = USAGE,
205        id = "Import",
206        translations =
207        {
208            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Datei mit Blutdruckdaten für den Import" ),
209            @Translation( language = "en", text = "File with Blood Pressure Data to be imported" )
210        }
211    )
212    @Option( name = "--import", metaVar = "FILE", usageKey = "org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.USAGE_Import" )
213    public Optional<File> getImportFile();
214
215    /**
216     *  Returns the encoding for the file to import.
217     *
218     *  @return An instance of
219     *      {@link Optional}
220     *      that holds the import encoding.
221     */
222    @Text(
223        description = "The usage text for the --importEncoding option",
224        use = USAGE,
225        id = "ImportEncoding",
226        translations =
227        {
228            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Das Encoding der Importdatei" ),
229            @Translation( language = "en", text = "The encoding of the import file" )
230        }
231    )
232    @Option( name = "--importEncoding", metaVar = "CHARSET", usageKey = "org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.USAGE_ImportEncoding" )
233    public Optional<Charset> getImportCharset();
234
235    /**
236     *  Returns the format for the file to import.
237     *
238     *  @return The import format.
239     */
240    @Text(
241        description = "The usage text for the --importFormat option",
242        use = USAGE,
243        id = "ImportFormat",
244        translations =
245        {
246            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Das Format der Importdatei" ),
247            @Translation( language = "en", text = "The format of the import file" )
248        }
249    )
250    @Option( name = "--importFormat", metaVar = "FORMAT", usageKey = "org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.USAGE_ImportFormat" )
251    public InputFormat getImportFormat();
252
253    /**
254     *  Returns the source of the file to import.
255     *
256     *  @return The import source.
257     */
258    @Text(
259        description = "The usage text for the --importSource option",
260        use = USAGE,
261        id = "ImportSource",
262        translations =
263        {
264            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Die Herkunft der Importdatei" ),
265            @Translation( language = "en", text = "The origin of the import file" )
266        }
267    )
268
269    @Option( name = "--importSource", metaVar = "ORIGIN", usageKey = "org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.USAGE_ImportSource" )
270    public String getImportSource();
271
272    /**
273     *  Returns the time zone for the record timestamps in the file to import.
274     *
275     *  @return The import time zone.
276     */
277    @Text(
278        description = "The usage text for the --importTimeZone option",
279        use = USAGE,
280        id = "ImportTimeZone",
281        translations =
282        {
283            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Die Zeitzone für die Zeitstempel in der Importdatei; wenn nicht angegeben, wird die aktuelle Zeitzone benutzt" ),
284            @Translation( language = "en", text = "The time zone for the record timestamps in the import file; if not set, the current time zone is used" )
285        }
286    )
287    @Option( name = "--importTimeZone", metaVar = "TIMEZONE", usageKey = "org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.USAGE_ImportTimeZone" )
288    public Optional<ZoneId> getImportTimeZone();
289
290    /**
291     *  Returns the instance of the configuration bean.
292     *
293     *  @return The configuration bean instance.
294     */
295    public static Configuration getInstance()
296    {
297        final var retValue = getConfiguration( Configuration.class, c -> c.getConstructor().newInstance() );
298
299        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
300        return retValue;
301    }   //  getInstance()
302
303    /**
304     *  Returns the name of the person whose blood pressure data is processed.
305     *
306     *  @return The name.
307     */
308    @Text(
309        description = "The usage text for the --name option",
310        use = USAGE,
311        id = "Name",
312        translations =
313            {
314                @Translation( language = "de", text = "Der Name der Person, deren Blutdruckdaten verarbeitet werden" ),
315                @Translation( language = "en", text = "The name of the person whose blood pressure data is processed" )
316            }
317    )
318    @Option( name = "--name", metaVar = "NAME", usageKey = "org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.USAGE_Name" )
319    @INIValue( group = "Owner", key = "name", comment = "The name of the person whose blood pressure data is processed" )
320    public String getName();
321
322    /**
323     *  Returns the destination for a report. Depending on the selected
324     *  {@link ReportFormat},
325     *  this is either a file or a folder. Any existing files will be
326     *  overwritten.
327     *
328     *  @return An instance of
329     *      {@link Optional}
330     *      that holds the destination file or folder.
331     *
332     *  @see    #getReportFormat()
333     */
334    @Text(
335        description = "The usage text for the --report option",
336        use = USAGE,
337        id = "Report",
338        translations =
339        {
340            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Ziel für den Report, entweder eine Datei oder ein Ordner; existierende Dateien werden überschrieben" ),
341            @Translation( language = "en", text = "The destination for a report, either a file or a folder; any already existing files will be overwritten" )
342        }
343    )
344    @Option( name = "--report", metaVar = "FILE", usageKey = "org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.USAGE_Report" )
345    public Optional<File> getReportFile();
346
347    /**
348     *  Returns the report format.
349     *
350     *  @return The report format.
351     */
352    @Text(
353        description = "The usage text for the --reportFormat option",
354        use = USAGE,
355        id = "ReportFormat",
356        translations =
357        {
358            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Das Ausgabeformat des Reports" ),
359            @Translation( language = "en", text = "The report output format" )
360        }
361    )
362    @Option( name = "--reportFormat", metaVar = "FORMAT", usageKey = "org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.USAGE_ReportFormat" )
363    public ReportFormat getReportFormat();
364
365    /**
366     *  Returns the report style.
367     *
368     *  @return The report style.
369     */
370    @Text(
371        description = "The usage text for the --reportStyle option",
372        use = USAGE,
373        id = "ReportStyle",
374        translations =
375        {
376            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Die Art des Reports" ),
377            @Translation( language = "en", text = "The report style" )
378        }
379    )
380    @Option( name = "--reportStyle", metaVar = "STYLE", usageKey = "org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.USAGE_ReportStyle" )
381    public String getReportStyle();
382
383    /**
384     *  Returns the start date for a report.
385     *
386     *  @return The start date.
387     */
388    @Text(
389        description = "The usage text for the --reportStart option",
390        use = USAGE,
391        id = "ReportStart",
392        translations =
393            {
394                @Translation( language = "de", text = "Das Start-Datum für die Report-Periode" ),
395                @Translation( language = "en", text = "The start date for the report period" )
396            }
397    )
398    @Option( name = "--reportStart", metaVar = "DATE", usageKey = "org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.USAGE_ReportStart" )
399    public LocalDate getStartDate();
400
401    /**
402     *  Returns the name of the current user.
403     *
404     *  @return The current user's name.
405     */
406    @SystemProperty( value = PROPERTY_USER_NAME )
407    public String getUsername();
408
409    /**
410     *  Initialises the configuration bean.
411     *
412     *  @return The initialisation data.
413     */
414    public Map<String,Object> initData();
415
416    /**
417     *  In case a new database was created, a call to this method will
418     *  initialise it.
419     *
420     *  @param  connection  The database connection.
421     *  @throws SQLException    The initialisation of the database failed.
422     */
423    public void initializeDatabase( Connection connection ) throws SQLException;
424
425    /**
426     *  Retrieves the connection to the database.
427     *
428     *  @return The connection to the database.
429     *  @throws SQLException    There is a problem with retrieving the database
430     *      connection.
431     */
432    public Connection retrieveConnection() throws SQLException;
433
434    /**
435     *  <p>{@summary Sets the clock that should be used for this program.}</p>
436     *  <p>This is used mainly for testing purposes.</p>
437     *
438     *  @param  clock   The clock.
439     */
440    @SuppressWarnings( "unused" )
441    public void setClock( final Clock clock );
442}
443//  interface Configuration
444
445/*
446 *  End of File
447 */
